name: @cardash/config
description: Configuration management library, standardizes application storage and access

scripts.test: npm run testEverything && npm run testWithoutSecrets && npm run testWithoutEnv
scripts.testEverything: cd test/witheverything && NODE_ENV=test nyc node test.js
scripts.testWithoutSecrets: cd test/withoutsecrets && NODE_ENV=test nyc --clean false node test.js
scripts.testWithoutEnv: cd test/withoutenv && NODE_ENV=test nyc --clean false node test.js

author: David Ellis <david@cardash.com>
